text: La pizza est délicieuses , surtout la vegetarienne,je ne sais pas le reste du menu mais bravo pour leur pizza.

Bien d'accord avec Oscar. Serveuses dépassées, pauvre accueil ,
Sourires absents, qualité certains jours tout dépendant du cuisinier, etc. 
J'y vais malgré tout à cause des heures et disponibilité de même que pour le spaghetti . Leurs frites sont vraiment immangeables de graisse et manque de cuisson............

I went there with my dad at 11 pm since it was the only restaurant that was still opened. When we first went in, one of the waiters gave us that bitchy look and the receptionist seated us. Our waiter Martine had one of these nastiest attitude and I honestly don't understand why shes still a waiter. The service was so horrible that it made me want to go see her and ask what was wrong with her. I ordered the 10inch sub and it was 15$! It tasted blend and it was definitely not worth the price. My dad ordered the sandwich and it came with fries and coslaw. The fried were not crunchy at all and it tasted like it was microwaved. The coslaw had a strong vinegar taste and it ruined the whole salad. I was hungry and wanted to leave quickly and when I had a mouthful of their tasteless sub, Martine came and took my plate without asking me if I had finished. She didnt even refill our water once! When we were done, I had to get up and ask for the bill because she stayed at the cash register like if she was contemplating life. We asked for the bill and it came off 40$ with the tip! It was definitely not worth the money and it was a huge disappointment. I would never ever go back again at this restaurant even if someone paid me to go.

It amazes me that this place is still in business. I ordered a souvlaki plate, the salad dressing was bland, the chicken in my pita was all diced up and had no flavour and the rice was straight out of the microwave and not even hot. All that for $14. The tastiest thing I ordered was the soft drink. All the upholstery on the booths are filthy and you can see parts of the walls are patched with plaster but have not been painted. Absolutely no pride in ownership and no pride in the food they serve. All in all, it was very disappointing and I will not be coming back. 

Just a side note, $2.75 for a can of coke is ridiculous!

Beaucoup de choix. J'y suis allez plusieurs fois au courant des années.

Les assiettes sont grandes, personne avec de petite appétit, ne dépasser pas les petites portions.

Tous les plats avec du bacon est fait de vrai tranche de bacon, que ce soit pizza, poutine ou autre. Déjà pour moi, c'est une étoile de ne pas avoir les petits boules de bacon que la majorité des places utilisent.

Si vous aimez le smoke meat, celui ci est vraiment délicieux. Pas vraiment gras, Bien cuit et en grande quantité dans l'assiette.

Le seul hic est pour la taille des poutines pour la livraison. Entre la petite et la grande, il n'y a que quelque dollars, ce n'est pas le problème. Le problème est que la petite est souvent trop petite et la grosse est facilement trois fois la taille de la petite.

Les canettes de liqueur dont 1.90$ lors de la livraison, Quand même cher.

J'ai essayé plusieurs desserts en salle et tous était bon avec une bonne taille, pas le genre à avoir un petit morceau au centre d'une assiette.
